title: Gurudwara
review: HemKund Sahib gurudwara Not Opened throughout the year because it is situated uphills so because of snow, landslides and weather conditions it remains closed during a specific season of winter  do check before going. Must Go place if you are in Uttrakhand.

title: Beautiful location and very clean
review: Gurdwara is near to bus stand (1.5km) and it is very clean and well maintained gurdwara. Rooms are very open and nice with nice food. If you are going to hemkund sahib, don't forget to collect your registration and drop the same while you come back here.

title: Nice and peaceful
review: This is situated in quite a big area.  This is so very well maintained and we can visit and eat langer any time.

title: Free Food Free Stay in Rishikesh ... Reminded me Amritsar Golden Temple
review: Me my wife and kid visited this Gurdwara in May 2018. As I entered, it reminded us of the Golden Temple, Amritsar. Almost same vibe, peaceful and langar hall where we can have free very tasty food, accommodation rooms are there to stay and other facilities also there.

title: Holy & Divine
review: This Gurudwara is pretty big and stretched. There is a pond as well with big fishes. Tourists can get rooms for a max of two days. Food is provided free in the lunger.

title: Divine place
review: Gurudwara is located near to the main bus stand of rishikesh, its a big gurudwara with accomodation available, one can also have good and simple food in the langar

title: Sachkhand hemkund sahib
review: Words can not define the joy and sense of fulfillment you get when you reach on top of the treck. We experienced snow when we went there and it was beautiful beyond imagination.

title: Place where Siks go to worship.
review: Place where Siks go to worship. Always welcome and Sikhs have a great way to make you feel welcome to visit there temple

title: Gurdwara
review: This gurdwara is the one that found opposite a petrol bunk. Believed to be a very famous one. Need to visit it next time.

title: Sacred lake and heaven on earth
review: Difficult roads take you to beatiful destinations and it is very true and Hemkund is one of the heaven on this earth, after trucking of 16 KM the place gives most devotional and feeling

title: Soothing experience
review: When I visited this Gurdwara in July 2018, it was not crowded much so had very nice darshan. Mentally very soothing..like all gurdwaras very clean.

title: Peaceful
review: This Gurudwara is peaceful. You can go this place and just relax. Very serene place in that vicinity.

title: Do try Langar
review: visited this gurudwara recently along with my wife and also enjoyed the langar and loving care of the caretakers.

title: Arduous trek but worth it!
review: The trek up to Hemkund Saheb is a long and extremely steep one. The route is fully paved though so one doesn't have to climb up muddy paths but it does take a long while to trek up the 6 kms.

title: Your Base Camp to the Hemkund expedition
review: Gurudwara Sri Hemkunt Sahib is on the Main Road in Muni ki Reti slightly towards Rishikesh side from Triveni Ghat cross-road.  Its mostly used for the tourist registration base camps for the pilgrims travelling to the Hemkund Shib ji, a lot of youth could be seen on the Bikes going for it..  Gives amazing feeling to me

title: Langar means a lot
review: If you're visiting Sri Hemkund sahib, you have to do Langar. the langar has special prashad of gurugranthsahib.

title: A grand Gurudwara
review: A nice place to visit. We had a friend who wanted to visit and so we accompanied him. It was good experience and the place is quite huge and offers food to all.

title: Waheguru
review: Hemkund Sahib Gurudwara in Rishikesh is so serene and divine and is located in a huge area. There is 24 hours Langar and so no one can remain hungry.

title: Best Place
review: Gurudwara sri Hemkund Sahib is one of best Gurudwara to visit and stay,neat and clean from all corners n base for visiting Shri Hemkund Sahib,Badrinath during season,sewadars always ready to help n Langars are offered even early in morning
